casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Marlene NALLY, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Joseph Nally, Sr., Deceased. No. 18-897. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 25, 2019. Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District denied. Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
